experiences.title: Codechef IGDTUW Chapter Leadr
experiences.subtitle: Codechef
workDescription: One among the 4 leads chosen by Codechef to run the IGDTUW Chapter.
As a lead I increased participation among students of my college by 90% gave guidance in improving their CP skills.
Conducted sessions to increase awareness and knowledge.
